ygData.subject: Re: Spell Data
ygData.msgSnippet: Great idea ! i can only say that enstill can be found in many cleric guilds ... Silverion High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh) Fenin Ro
ygData.messageBody:
Great idea ! i can only say that enstill can be found in many cleric guilds





At 22.13 08/06/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Barry Ward" <blw164@...>
>
>Hello everyone,
>This is my first message.
>
>I must say that I find all the info very informing, lets keep it that way.
>The time has past for us to tell Verant our problems, lets move on.
>
>I would like for us to gather up the location(s) of every spell. Yes the
>early spells might be acquired everywhere, but I don't want to have to run
>around like a chicken-with-my-head-cut-off. If anyone else is interesting in
>doing this, send me an email with your spell data.
>Once I have a large sum of spell locations, I'll post them.
>Thank you,
>Telor(Karana)
>blw164@...
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist members are using Shared Files in great ways!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Are you? If not, see our homepage for details.


Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
